comments:
I am using the 1.5M6 DTP build.

From the Data Source Explorer I right-click on Databases and select new. I then set up a connection to a derby database. Clicking the test connection button says the ping succeeded.

Once I return to the Data Source Explorer I right-click on my new connection and click connect. Nothing happens. I am unable to expand the node. I try to ping the connection and the ping is successful, but I still cannot connect and expand my node.

I had a similar problem trying to connect to a DB2 database as well.

I see in my log file...

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.navigator 4 0 2007-04-19 14:24:35.516

I think your installation may be suspect.  This assertion should only occur if you have multiple plugins contributing connection profile extensions with the same IDs.  I'd recommend performing a clean installation.

Please provide detailed steps to reproduce.

Changing resolution to WORKSFORME pending updates from reporter.
This turned out just to be an install problem. Thanks.
